mapper.insert: insert into board.tbl_board(title, content, writer) values(#{title}, #{content}, #{writer})
mapper.select: select bno, title, content, writer, regDate, viewCnt from board.tbl_board where bno = #{bno}
mapper.update: update board.tbl_board set title = #{title}, content = #{content}, writer = #{writer} where bno = #{bno}
mapper.select: select bno, title, writer, regDate, viewCnt from board.tbl_board order by bno desc limit #{displayPost}, #{postNum}
